permissionLackingMessage: @{name} you lack the choob needed to execute this command!

messages.giftedsubs: {gifter} the Great Choob is pleased with your actions

joinchoob.joinMessage: Choob Bot has joined your channel!
joinchoob.existsMessage: Choob Bot is already in your channel!

leavechoob.leaveMessage: Choob Bot has left your channel...
leavechoob.errorMessage: Choob Bot was not in your channel

updatechoob.failMessage: Hmm, seems like a Choob got plugged along the way...

togglechoob.onMessage: !Choob command has been enabled in this channel
togglechoob.offMessage: !Choob command has been disabled in this channel

choobcount.message: There are {count} choobs in the database!

choobchannels.message: There are {count} members of the Choob Continuum

addchoob.message: Added: "{msg}" to the master Choob list!

removechoob.message: Removed: "{msg}" from the master Choob list!

choobinfo.message: 'Choob' originated when O'D said the word 'tube' with his native accent during a game of Codenames. http://bit.ly/choob-origin

choobhelp.message: For a list of commands head to my channel! https://www.twitch.tv/choob_bot
